title: Question validity & PMP 2021 alignment not explicit
summary: Users cannot easily verify questions are scenario-based and PMP 2021 aligned.

title: Onboarding diagnostic not visible
summary: Existing users miss onboarding diagnostic and hit decision paralysis.

title: Smart Practice value unclear
summary: Users do not understand what makes Smart Practice adaptive or smart.

title: Mock exam accessible too early
summary: Users with zero mastery can start a mock exam and get discouraged.

title: XP not tied to readiness
summary: XP levels do not communicate exam readiness or pass probability.

title: Domain progress lacks context
summary: Domain progress numbers lack total scope and mastery thresholds.
